title: Handle a Purchase Order Acknowledgement
description: A supplier sends back an acknowledgement for a purchase order, but with a different delivery date than requested.

tasks.description: Receive the PO acknowledgement from the supplier.
Compare the acknowledged details with the original PO.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent notices the delivery date has been pushed back by two weeks.

tasks.description: Update the expected delivery date for the PO in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the ETA for the PO.

tasks.description: Decide whether to accept the new date or try to negotiate a better one with the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accepts the new date as it does not critically impact any customer orders.
